item.title: The National Organization for Marriage Attempted to Write a Hate Piece About Me
item.description: Hey NOM, Sam Killermann here. Or, as I’m being described on your Facebook Page, “Sin with Colored Pencils” here. I read the “blog post” you wrote about me and my “Genderbread Person.” To be “honest,” I couldn’t put together exactly what you were “trying” to say.

item.title: An Open Letter to the Disney Channel
item.description: Dear Disney Channel, Please stop ruining today’s children. I would love to stop there, because I think the sassiness of one sentence is an appropriate response to the hollowness of your programming, but I refuse to stoop to your level. Earlier tonight, while at a laundromat, I was subjected to an hour of your work, a show called _Jessie.
